product_name: Julbo Zulu Polarized Photochromic Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: These Julbo Zulu sunglasses with polarized photochromic lenses give you clear vision at all times. They can be worn in low to extreme light for sun protection in any condition, anywhere you travel.
